Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma hit 10 boundaries and 3 sixes in a knock that would give him a lot of joy
Rohit Sharma fell for 87 in 101 balls
Post-Match Reflections: India huffed and puffed to 229 for 9 in 50 overs against England in Lucknow, thanks to a handy 49 from Suryakumar Yadav in the end and useful contributions from Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav
Miscellaneous Highlights: Notably, it was the 4th time Rohit Sharma got out for 80s in ODI cricket in 2023. Only two other batters have gotten out in 80s as many as 4 times in a calendar year in ODI cricket.
